Licensee and animals no longer reside at the site address. Licensee are required to notify Animal Care no fewer than 90
days prior to any change in address, location, or activities. Licensee should contact Animal Care to update address or
request cancelation of license.
To be corrected by 6/1/2024.

narrative:
2.1(b)(1) 
   
Requirements and application 
Licensee and animals no longer reside at the site address. Licensee are required to notify Animal Care no fewer than 90 
days prior to any change in address, location, or activities. Licensee should contact Animal Care to update address or 
request cancelation of license. 
To be corrected by 6/1/2024. 
 
This exit interview was conducted with licensee.
